Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Hell Beast sat Inferno upright and slammed his head down. Inferno's 
eyes made a somewhat attempt to function, but he was still out of it. Hell 
Beast un did his face plate and observed the fractured battery that the EMP 
blast had destroyed. He took it out and replaced it with a temporary one. 
Inferno might be up and fighting agian after a warm up.
       The EMP blasts delivered by Killfest soared over head, the other two 
exploding as Tankkor met them with several of his own missles.
       (As for moding, the rules say characters cant be over 15 feet, so 
theres no way Iron Raptor can be 20. Also, isnt placing metal plates on the 
CF moding? I mean, when I put sheild plates around my perimiter I got in 
trouble, so I really hope some one will look into this matter seriously and 
quickly.)

--part1_10.b27daa3.280614be_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
